comments: Note: not the same author as Holub bis. (1928-1995).
examples: Zerna monoclada (Domin) Holub in Novit. Bot. & Del. Sem. Hort. Bot. Univ. Carol. Prag.: 9. 1960.
source: 'Ludwig' removed because not part of name according to Jan Kirschner. Date of death 23 July 1999 from Milo Kovanda. Obituary in Preslia 72(2-4): 98-166 (2000), incl. portr. and bibliogr.
